name: donejs-donejs
description: Creates Compatibility between donejs-cli and generator-dssrv

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run mocha
scripts.publish: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.postinstall: echo $PWD && ln -s $PWD/node_modules/generator-dssrv/app $PWD/app && ln -s $PWD/node_modules/generator-dssrv/app $PWD/app && ln -s $PWD/node_modules/generator-dssrv/lib $PWD/lib && ln -s $PWD/node_modules/generator-dssrv/module $PWD/module  &&  ln -s $PWD/node_modules/generator-dssrv/plugin $PWD/plugin &&  ln -s $PWD/node_modules/generator-dssrv/supermodel $PWD/supermodel
